product_name: Natural High Strawberry Granola with Milk - 2 Servings
long_description: Rolled oats and honey with freeze-dried strawberries and nuts in nonfat milk make a delicious breakfast or trail snack. Mix with cold water and eat out of the packet. No preservatives, artificial colors, or additives. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: Rolled oats and honey with freeze-dried strawberries and nuts in nonfat milk make a delicious breakfast or trail snack.
